text:
there's the introductory tutorial: <https://juliagpu.github.io/CUDA.jl/stable/tutorials/introduction/>
a couple of more were in development here, <https://github.com/Ellipse0934/CUDATutorials.jl>, but havent' been finished yet

text: Thanks a lot ! I'll take a look

attachments.title: An Introduction to GPU Programming in Julia
attachments.text: This article aims to give a quick introduction about how GPUs work and specifically give an overlook of the current Julia GPU ecosystem and how easy it is to get simple GPU programs running. To make things easier, you can run all the code samples directly in the article if you have an account and click on edit.
attachments.fallback: An Introduction to GPU Programming in Julia
